data.title: Little Machine
data.statement:
Your goal is to build an interactive interpreter for simple programming language, which uses the following statements:

Statements:
inc - adds 1 to variable
dec - subtracts 1 from variable
print - prints the variable (value) without space
exit - ends the input
double - variable is multiplied by 2
half -  variable is divided by 2

The starting value is 0.

testCases.title: Simple
testCases.testIn: inc inc dec inc print exit

testCases.title: Simple
testCases.testIn: inc inc dec inc inc print exit

testCases.title: Double And Half
testCases.testIn: inc inc double double inc inc half print exit

testCases.title: Double And Half
testCases.testIn: inc double double inc inc half print exit

testCases.title: After Print
testCases.testIn: inc double double double double inc print inc half exit

testCases.title: After Print
testCases.testIn: inc double double double double double inc print half exit

testCases.title: Negative
testCases.testIn: dec dec double double double double double double double inc inc inc inc dec inc half print exit

testCases.title: Negative
testCases.testIn: dec dec double double double double double double double inc inc inc inc dec double inc inc half print exit

testCases.title: After Exit
testCases.testIn: inc inc double inc print exit inc print

testCases.title: After Exit
testCases.testIn: inc inc inc double inc print exit inc print

testCases.title: Triple Print
testCases.testIn: inc print inc print inc print exit

testCases.title: Double Print
testCases.testIn: inc double print inc double print exit

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Your goal is to build an interactive interpreter for simple programming language, which uses the following statements:

Statements:
inc - adds 1 to variable
dec - subtracts 1 from variable
print - prints the variable (value) without space
exit - ends the input
double - variable is multiplied by 2
half - variable is divided by 2

The starting value is 0.
Input
Space separated statements.
Output
The printed output.
Constraints
Example
Input
inc inc dec inc print exit
Output
2
